dl.dd: This method is used to change which page is currently displayed, specified by the pageID argument. The page will be changed regardless of the value of template.XULProp("canAdvance") or template.XULProp("canRewind"). The template.XULAttr("onwizardback") and template.XULAttr("onwizardnext") code is not called when using this function.
